code: import{combineReducers,configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{pagesReducer}from"./slices/pages/pagesSlice";import{inputsReducer}from"./slices/inputs/inputsSlice";import postsReducer from"./slices/posts/postsSlice";import{searchReducer}from"./slices/search/searchSlice";import{persistStore,persistReducer,FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage};var rootReducer=combineReducers({search:searchReducer,pages:pagesReducer,inputs:inputsReducer,posts:postsReducer});var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);var store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer,middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:[FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER]}});}});export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default store;
